remarks: Comparing two decimal integers (unequal higher places).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Feb-2014.)
statement:
numlt.1 $e |- T e. NN $.
numlt.2 $e |- A e. NN0 $.
numlt.3 $e |- B e. NN0 $.
numltc.3 $e |- C e. NN0 $.
numltc.4 $e |- D e. NN0 $.
numltc.5 $e |- C < T $.
numltc.6 $e |- A < B $.
numltc $p |- ( ( T x. A ) + C ) < ( ( T x. B ) + D ) $.
